original: cicchaktiṃ kalayanti śāktanivahāḥ sāṅkhyā paraṃ pūruṣaṃ
analyzed: cit śaktim kalayanti śākta nivahāḥ sāṅkhyā param pūruṣam
brahma abrahma vidaḥ vadanti avatu vaḥ tat daivya siṃham vapuḥ
bibhrati adbhuta bhūti bhūtapa vacaḥ vaicitrya citra amṛta
srotaśālini sannibandhana sarit sambhedam abhyarhitam
navye ismin naradeva nirmita puraścaryā arṇave dvādaśaḥ
sat yuktim sphuṭa mauktika utkara rucā uttuṅgaḥ taraṅgaḥ gataḥ

iti śrī girirāja cakra cūḍāmaṇi nara nārāyaṇa ityādi vividha viruda āvalī virājamāna māna unnata śrīmat mahārāja adhirāja śrī pratāpasiṃha sāhadeva viracite puraścaryārṇave brāhmī ādi mantra puraścaraṇa pūrvaka yantra stava kavaca ādi puraścaraṇabhedanirūpaṇam nāma dvādaśaḥ taraṅgaḥ samāptaḥ  /
